sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>New p1 incident is created with the copied fields. old incident is set to Oh-Hold > Awaiting Major incident related to the new Incident number</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 01:30:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>Add a new UI Action: Create a Major incident which will re-direct the user to a new Incident. The new incident Priotiy will be = 1 and in the related record, the source incident will be realted. The fields that will be copied over: short_descrition description category sub_category caller  The old incident will be set as On-Hold > Awaiting Major Incident with the relevent record related to it.</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:30:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001080</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Major Incident - UI Action</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-20 20:41:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6904b5674fa423007e72aa95d310c7e8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 09:47:18</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
